You are always looking for a better, more efficient way to do things. At XPO Logistics, we are looking for people who can effectively identify strategies to help people and systems work smarter. As the Business Intelligence Analyst Principal, you will be responsible for providing technical leadership for solution design and architecture of analytics-based tools with a thorough understanding of available and emerging technologies, in support of strategic initiatives and ongoing business processes. You will lead projects, allocate and manage resources to develop solutions that leverage and expand upon the company Business Intelligence (BI) platform, with deliverables ranging from description and diagnostic reporting to predictive and prescriptive decision automation. This role is critical in positioning XPO for long-term success. Pay, benefits and more. We are eager to attract the best, so we offer competitive compensation and a generous benefits package, including full health insurance (medical, dental and vision), 401(k), life insurance, disability, and the opportunity to participate in a company incentive plan.
